question: Three people attend yoga classes at intervals of 12, 15 and 18 days. They all attended a class on January 1, 2024. When will they next attend a class together?

question: The least number which when decreased by 3 is exactly divisible by 10, 16, 20, and 25 is:

Three numbers p, q and r have the following properties:
  • The HCF of p and q is 24.
  • The LCM of p and q is 144.
  • The LCM of q and r is 73.
  • The HCF of p and r is 12.

Which of the following statements is true about the relationship between p, q and r?
